Posts.Content: Thanks I'll let you know xx p.s. I also love the accidental headings above!
Posts.Title: Breast implant and lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I have a something called Poland Syndrome, a birth defect that means you are missing a breast. I had an implant 15 years ago to help with this. A couple of weeks ago I found a pea size lump in the same breast. I had a mammogram and ultrasound, but because of the implant the consultant says he couldn't do a biopsy. And as he wasn't sure whether it was benign or cancer that I would need a lumpectomy. Only then will they be able to tell what it is. Has anyone had a lumpectomy with a breast implant here? I was also wondering how long the waiting list on the NHS for this? And how long the recovery time is? I'm not very good at all this waiting!! Thanks Panga
Posts.Title: Breast implant and lumpectomy
